data.lyric:
[ti:Carter's Son (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:AI YoungBoy 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Carter Son (Explicit) - Youngboy Never Broke Again
[00:00.19]Lyrics by：Kentrell Gaulden/Jacier Pearson/Lachlan Gentle/Kaleb
[00:00.39]You're a Genius McFly
[00:08.40]AI
[00:13.34]It's the Carter's son
[00:17.34]The Carter's
[00:20.00]Turn me up a lil'
[00:23.86]Picture me new 3D denim I'm city rollin'
[00:26.78]Rollin'
[00:27.60]But did I mention this my own clothin'
[00:29.65]The f**k you mean
[00:30.75]Made n***a bought my own Rollie
[00:32.59]But if them crackers pull me over they gon' say I stole it
[00:35.30]Good mornin' we on it I went bought two S trophies
[00:37.61]My father left my sis and bros to them I feel I owed it
[00:40.57]But let's not be heroic 'cause everybody roguish
[00:43.40]They don't want us totin' guns but they let the f**kin' killers tote it
[00:46.39]Let's take a ride and see though where them people be though
[00:49.27]Colt 45 the grip design bought this b***h from Casino
[00:52.20]Soprano no Soprino we live life like Yung Bino
[00:55.11]Had a show in B-more after that post on the block with Chino
[00:57.79]I'm a hustlin' motherf**ker
[00:58.92]Look for a star on every hundred C note
[01:01.04]I'm the top on YouTube f**k a new school I don't use no Vevo
[01:03.76]These n***as 'round me they too cruel
[01:05.07]They bust tools and die for me though
[01:06.91]I don't pay money for no life the murder pay off me so
[01:10.44]Came out alright
[01:14.59]But I'm blinded from the life I can't see though
[01:22.30]Got juveniles on the block thirty stick hangin' out the Glock
[01:25.27]Bandana tied 'round the clip and they go all out for me though
[01:33.96]Sucked all the pain up let's f**k the game up
[01:36.43]Plenty n***as on the block pushin' that rock
[01:38.50]It's the Carter's son
[01:39.82]You got your change up they brought your name up
[01:42.29]When it's war we wet they block and when it's said
[01:44.02]This s**t'll never be done
[01:45.66]I can't say I'm f**king with all this involvement
[01:48.94]These n***as ain't right and they ballin'
[01:51.35]I don't give a f**k no I call up Osama my baba
[01:54.78]Like Load up and come and rob all them
[01:56.91]Rob all them
[01:57.70]Venezuela ventilator
[01:58.97]My first trip to Georgia made 'em
[02:00.38]Some companions with ambitions was
[02:02.00]Double G NBA native
[02:03.31]I wish baptism could've saved us
[02:04.93]Never broke until the grave in
[02:06.17]Excuse ourselves knock on the tables
[02:07.61]I make a p***y bite the pavement
[02:09.10]I can't say I'm f**king with all this involvement
[02:12.38]These n***as ain't right and they ballin'
[02:14.78]I don't give a f**k no I call up Osama my baba
[02:18.14]Like Load up and come and rob all them
[02:20.39]Rob all them
[02:20.84]Came out alright
[02:24.56]But I'm blinded from the life I can't see though
[02:32.45]Got juveniles on the block thirty stick hangin' out the Glock
[02:35.51]Bandana tied 'round the clip and they go all out for me though
[02:39.38]That's my son that's my slime
[02:41.48]He on my dime it's the Carter's son
data.trans:
[ti:Carter's Son (Explicit)]
[ar:Youngboy Never Broke Again]
[al:AI YoungBoy 2 (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:00.19]//
[00:00.39]KK McFly 你真是奇才
[00:08.40]//
[00:13.34]这是Carter的孩子
[00:17.34]Carter的孩子
[00:20.00]让我振作一点
[00:23.86]想到我 穿着崭新的3D剪裁牛仔裤 我摇身一变
[00:26.78]//
[00:27.60]我有提过我的衣服吗
[00:29.65]你究竟是什么意思
[00:30.75]功成名就 给我自己买了块劳力士手表
[00:32.59]要是警察把我拦下来 他们一定说这是我偷来的
[00:35.30]早上好 我蓄势待发 我要去挣回奖杯
[00:37.61]我爸爸离开了我的兄弟姐妹 对于他们 我心怀愧疚
[00:40.57]别逞英雄 每个人都会干坏事
[00:43.40]他们让我别带武器 可是他们却让杀手带着枪
[00:46.39]让我们开着车四处看看 他们人究竟在哪里
[00:49.27]卡尔特45型手枪 精良的设计 在赌场赢得妹子的芳心
[00:52.20]观看Sheed Soprano的直播 我们聊起了Yung Bino
[00:55.11]在Baltimore有一场演出 我出现在街角 偷偷地进行交易
[00:57.79]为了赚钱 我不择手段
[00:58.92]精挑细选 出类拔萃 我赚了许多钱
[01:01.04]我荣登YouTube榜首 别出心裁 我不会使用Vevo
[01:03.76]我身边的人 他们冷血无情
[01:05.07]他们缴械投降 为我而死
[01:06.91]我不会为任何人花钱 这次谋杀让我付出代价
[01:10.44]成功脱身 安然无恙
[01:14.59]生活蒙蔽了我的双眼 我无法看见
[01:22.30]街上的少年 全副武装 带着格洛克枪四处游荡
[01:25.27]大方巾系在武器上 他们为我鼓足干劲
[01:33.96]承担所有痛苦 让我们把这场游戏搞砸
[01:36.43]街区上有很多人前赴后继 乐此不疲
[01:38.50]这是Carter的孩子
[01:39.82]你有独门绝招 他们提到你的名字
[01:42.29]双方开战 我们大杀四方 当消息不胫而走
[01:44.02]矢口否认
[01:45.66]我不能说我全都参与其中
[01:48.94]这些人品行不正 四处炫耀
[01:51.35]我毫不在乎 我给奥萨马打个电话
[01:54.78]叫嚣着 放马过来 把他们洗劫一空
[01:56.91]把他们洗劫一空
[01:57.70]委内瑞拉 放松一下
[01:58.97]我第一次去乔治亚州见他们
[02:00.38]身边都是野心勃勃的朋友
[02:02.00]身价翻倍 无人能及
[02:03.31]我希望洗礼可以拯救我们
[02:04.93]在我去世以前 绝不会一败涂地
[02:06.17]请谅解我们拍案而起
[02:07.61]我让怂货甘败涂地
[02:09.10]我不能说我全都参与其中
[02:12.38]这些人品行不正 四处炫耀
[02:14.78]我毫不在乎 我给奥萨马打个电话
[02:18.14]叫嚣着 放马过来 把他们洗劫一空
[02:20.39]把他们洗劫一空
[02:20.84]成功脱身 安然无恙
[02:24.56]生活蒙蔽了我的双眼 我无法看见
[02:32.45]街上的少年 全副武装 带着格洛克枪四处游荡
[02:35.51]大方巾系在武器上 他们为我鼓足干劲
[02:39.38]这是我的孩子 这是我的朋友
[02:41.48]他占尽便宜 这是Carter的孩子
